channel.title: Home on Providence Healthtech
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Providence Healthtech

item.title: Global Health Initiative
item.description: Providence Healthtech is committed to health equity around the world. The Providence Healthtech Global Health Initiative offers low-to-no cost EMR and Practice Management solutions to healthcare clinics in low and middle income countries. This includes a customized implementation to meet the specific needs of the local area, access to training material, and use of our cloud infrastructure. Providence Healthtech provides access to OpenEMR, the world’s leading open-source electronic medical records software.

item.title: School Nursing EMR
item.description: School nurses deserve high-quality EMR solutions. Providence HealthTech offers a comprehensive solution for school nurses. Whether you provide health services to a single, small, school or are managing a team of nurses throughout an entire school district, Providence HealthTech can provide an EMR solution that optimizes your workflow and reduces time spent documenting, leaving you with more time to spend caring for your students.

item.title: Schedule a Call
item.description: Interested in learning more about Providence’s various offerings, including our flagship electronic medical record software? Schedule a call to discuss how Providence can improve your clinical and business workflows or view a tailor made demo of our EMR, Polaris. item.title: Marketing Internship
item.description: The Marketing Intern is a semi-professional who assists in advertising and promotional efforts within the company.
